about_the_game:
Sealand 2124 is a futuristic city floating over the endless expanse of the ocean—a mesmerizing place filled with hope, secrets, and challenges.

In a world shaped by the aftermath of climate change, Anja is drawn into this floating city of the future by an unexpected twist of fate. But beneath the gleaming surface of this utopian metropolis lie puzzles, conflicts, and a looming mystery that can only be uncovered with wit and determination.

Anja’s journey is accompanied by a clever albino magpie with sharp humor and a love for shiny objects. More than just a charming companion, this feisty bird plays an essential role in exploring and solving the challenges that await.

In Sealand 2124, you’ll explore a richly detailed world, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the hidden stories of this floating city. What begins as a chance encounter turns into a gripping journey that will change both Anja’s and your world forever.

Key Features:

  • Captivating Narrative: Uncover the mysteries of a futuristic city while experiencing a touching story of hope and transformation.

  • Interactive Companion: A witty albino magpie brings humor and clever insights, adding depth to your adventure.

  • Challenging Puzzles: Solve creative, world-integrated puzzles that test both your logic and dexterity.

  • Atmospheric Design: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning ocean city with unique architecture, immersive sound design, and a melancholic atmosphere.

  • Environmental Themes: Discover a future where human ingenuity and nature coexist in a fragile balance.

Are you ready to unveil the world behind Sealand?

Add the game to your wishlist now and dive into the adventure in 2025!
